channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Attacking GraphQL
item.description: I - DVGA Use the following script to install & run DVGA : git clone https://github.com/dolevf/Damn-Vulnerable-GraphQL-Application.git && cd Damn-Vulnerable-GraphQL-Application docker build -t dvga . docker run -d -t -p 5013:5013 -e WEB_HOST=0.0.0.0 --name dvga dvga II - Toolkits nmap graphql-introspection Altair InQL SQLmap graphw00f III - Recon is GraphQL running ? What Endpoint ? What GraphQL Engine ? Attack Surface ? We can answer all these question using graphw00f :

item.title: Attacking GraphQL
item.description: I - DVGA Use the following script to install & run DVGA : git clone https://github.com/dolevf/Damn-Vulnerable-GraphQL-Application.git && cd Damn-Vulnerable-GraphQL-Application docker build -t dvga . docker run -d -t -p 5013:5013 -e WEB_HOST=0.0.0.0 --name dvga dvga II - Toolkits nmap graphql-introspection Altair InQL SQLmap graphw00f III - Recon is GraphQL running ? What Endpoint ? What GraphQL Engine ? Attack Surface ? We can answer all these question using graphw00f :
